alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Pope; Van Buren; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 12:41PM CDT until March 31 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Western Cleburne County in north central Arkansas... Conway County in central Arkansas... North central Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Yell County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1241 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Atkins, or 10 miles east of Russellville, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Russellville... Clinton... Atkins... Pottsville... Damascus... Twin Groves... Bethlehem... Happy Bend... Solgohachia... Claude... Cleveland... Catholic Point... Hattieville... Middleton... Lanty... Fairbanks... Whipple... Jerusalem... St. Vincent... Blick... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Pope; Van Buren; Yell
